mapper.select: SELECT cinema_name, cinema_code FROM cinema LEFT JOIN location ON cinema.location_code = location.location_code WHERE location_name = #{location_name}

SELECT cinema.cinema_name ,location_name ,notice_subject ,notice_write_date FROM notice_board LEFT JOIN cinema ON cinema.cinema_name = notice_board.cinema_name LEFT JOIN location ON location.location_code = cinema.location_code ORDER BY notice_write_date desc LIMIT 5

SELECT A.* , group_concat(concat(sch_start_time) SEPARATOR '/') AS starttimes , group_concat(concat(sch_last_time) SEPARATOR '/') AS lasttimes , group_concat(concat(screen_name) SEPARATOR '/') AS names
FROM ( SELECT schedule.sch_movie_date , DATE_FORMAT(schedule.sch_start_time, '%H:%i') AS sch_start_time , DATE_FORMAT(schedule.sch_last_time, '%H:%i') AS sch_last_time , cinema.cinema_name -- 극장이름 , cinema.cinema_code -- 극장번호 , CASE movieInfo.info_rating -- 등급 WHEN '18세관람가(청소년관람불가)' THEN 'rate-x' WHEN '15세관람가' THEN 'rate-15' WHEN '12세관람가' THEN 'rate-12' WHEN '전체관람가' THEN 'rate-all' ELSE '' END AS 'rate' , movieInfo.info_movie_code -- 영화 코드 , movieInfo.info_movie_title -- 영화이름 , screen.seat_sum -- 좌석 총수 , screen.screen_name -- 상영관명 , schedule.sch_screen_code -- 상영관코드 , schedule.sch_code -- 상영번호 , IFNULL(CAST(screen.seat_sum AS UNSIGNED)-cast(reservation.res_count AS unsigned),45) AS remain_seat -- 남은좌석 FROM schedule LEFT JOIN cinema ON cinema.cinema_code = schedule.sch_cinema_code LEFT JOIN movieInfo ON movieInfo.info_movie_code = schedule.sch_movie_code LEFT JOIN screen on screen.screen_code = schedule.sch_screen_code LEFT JOIN reservation ON schedule.sch_code = reservation.res_sch_code where 1=1 AND sch_cinema_code = #{cinema_code} AND sch_movie_date=#{date} AND sch_movie_date >= CURRENT_DATE() -- 현재 날짜 이후 AND ((sch_movie_date = CURRENT_DATE() AND sch_start_time >= CURRENT_TIME()) OR sch_movie_date > CURRENT_DATE()) -- 현재 시간 이후 ORDER BY info_movie_title ) A GROUP BY info_movie_title, sch_screen_code;
SELECT member_prefer_branch,cinema_code FROM MEMBER JOIN cinema ON MEMBER.member_prefer_branch = cinema.cinema_name WHERE member_id=#{id};

SELECT CAST(screen.seat_sum AS UNSIGNED)-cast( reservation.res_count AS unsigned) AS remain_seat FROM reservation LEFT JOIN schedule ON schedule.sch_code = reservation.res_screen_code LEFT JOIN screen ON screen.screen_code = reservation.res_screen_code WHERE res_sch_code =#{sch_code};
